pros: Work with ivy league professionals. Deal with many projects coming the most diverse areas. great way to learn a lot in terms of analysis, research, etc, permanent employment, good pay, and other services.
cons: Hierarchical Leadership. Micromanagement of even what you type. Total lack of freedom. Interference of unions and politics curb the research-oriented environment.
